name: Enhanced Weakening
bonus_lumina: +15% to damage reduction inflicted by Weakening.
unlock_description: Obtained by completing Level 10, Trial 3 of the tower.

name: Burning Affinity
bonus_lumina: Damage increased by 25% against targets affected by Burn.
unlock_description: From the Manor door in the Chromatic Watcher area, take the passage on the right to reach a cart. You'll find the picto placed on it.

name: Reversed Affinity
bonus_lumina: Applies Inversion on self for 3 turns at the start of battle.
unlock_description: To buy from Kasumi, a Gestral merchant, for 9,870 chroma.

name: Altered
bonus_lumina: Damage increased by 15% per alteration on the character.
unlock_description: In the old farm area, start from the flag and go straight to the back of the area to find a rock. Use Paint Break to break it and discover a Chromatic Gault. You must defeat it to obtain the picto.

name: Burn Immunity
bonus_lumina: Immunity to Burn.
unlock_description: Obtained by defeating the Gargant boss.

name: Charm Immunity
bonus_lumina: Immunity to Charm.
unlock_description: Obtained by defeating the Weaver.

name: Corruption Immunity
bonus_lumina: Immunity to Corruption.
unlock_description: To buy from the merchant Eragol for 67,350 chroma.

name: Freeze Immunity
bonus_lumina: Immunity to Freeze.
unlock_description: Can be found in the paint sphere of the Icefall area.

name: Stun Immunity
bonus_lumina: Immunity to Stun.
unlock_description: Obtained by defeating the Chromatic Petank.

name: Assurance
bonus_lumina: Takes 50% less damage but cannot receive healing.
unlock_description: Obtained by defeating the trio near the carousel east of the Floating Casino.

name: Increased Attack
bonus_lumina: Each time the character deals damage, attempts to consume 1 AP. If successful, damage is increased by 20%.
unlock_description: Placed on the ground in the Valley of Anger, right next to the contortionist.

name: Weakening Attack
bonus_lumina: Basic attacks inflict Weakening for 1 turn.
unlock_description: Placed in front of a body near buildings buried under snow.

name: Enhanced Attack
bonus_lumina: Basic attack damage increased by 50%.
unlock_description: Obtained by defeating the Chromatic Chancellor in the glade corridor.

name: Combo Attack I
bonus_lumina: Basic attack allows an additional hit.
unlock_description: Obtained by defeating the Duelist boss.

name: Combo Attack II
bonus_lumina: Basic attack allows an additional hit.
unlock_description: After defeating the two bosses in the area, return to the second boss's location to find a Chromatic Dark Clair. You must defeat it to obtain the picto.

name: Combo Attack III
bonus_lumina: Basic attack allows an additional hit.
unlock_description: Win the third fight in an arena only accessible by air above Golden Harvest.

name: Fracturing Attack
bonus_lumina: Fracture damage increased by 50% on basic attacks.
unlock_description: From the Coral Cave flag, head to the right.

name: Weakening Strike
bonus_lumina: Basic attacks inflict Vulnerability for 1 turn.
unlock_description: To buy from Noco after defeating him.

name: Protective Strike
bonus_lumina: Basic attacks grant Shell for 1 turn.
unlock_description: To buy from the merchant Anthonypo for 100,050 chroma.

name: Empowering Strike
bonus_lumina: Basic attacks grant Empowerment for 1 turn.
unlock_description: To buy from the Gestral merchant for 67,350 chroma after defeating him.

name: In the Thick of It
bonus_lumina: +3 shields at the start of battle, but max health is halved.
unlock_description: Go to the end of the area to find the picto guarded by Nevrons.

name: At Death's Door
bonus_lumina: Deals 50% more damage if health is below 10%.
unlock_description: Obtained by defeating the Workshop Lamp Master. The picto obtained here is an improved version of the one obtained during your adventure by defeating the Lamp Master at Rockwave Cliffs. We recommend waiting until level 70 before facing this ultimate version of the Lamp Master.

name: Funeral Bomb
bonus_lumina: Deals damage to all enemies upon death.
unlock_description: After flag 68, go right to find the picto at the end of a dead-end.

name: Basic Shield
bonus_lumina: +1 shield if the character has no shield at the start of the turn.
unlock_description: After completing all fights in the area, go up the stairs and through the door to pick up the picto on the ground.

name: Overpowered Shield
bonus_lumina: Damage increased by 10% per shield point on the character.
unlock_description: To buy from the merchant Anthonypo for 80,040 chroma.

name: Refined Shields
bonus_lumina: Damage increased by 30% while the character has shields, but all shields are lost upon taking any damage.
unlock_description: To buy from the Gestral merchant for 78,575 chroma after defeating him.

name: Fracturing Burn
bonus_lumina: Fracture damage increased by 25% against enemies affected by Burn.
unlock_description: On the ground behind the Bud located northwest of the Gestral Beach.

name: Energizing Burn
bonus_lumina: +1 AP when applying Burn. Once per turn.
unlock_description: Obtained by defeating the Chromatic Watcher in the Icefall area.

name: Critical Burns
unlock_description: To buy from the merchant Anthonypo for 116,725 chroma.

name: Prolonged Burns
bonus_lumina: Burn duration increased by 2.
unlock_description: To buy from the merchant Fusoka for 142,625 chroma.

name: Healing Buff
bonus_lumina: Recovers 15% health when applying a buff.
unlock_description: From the merchant Eragol, take the hot air balloon. After defeating the orphans, get close enough to the void to use the grappling hook to reach the platform opposite. Use the grappling hook again then descend the rope to find the picto.

name: Glass Cannon
bonus_lumina: Deals 25% more damage but also takes 25% more damage.
unlock_description: To buy from the Gestral merchant for 67,350 chroma after defeating him.

name: Enhanced Shell
bonus_lumina: +10% to damage reduction granted by Shell.
unlock_description: After taking a flying platform near the paint sphere, take the right path and eliminate enemies to retrieve the picto at the end.

name: Instant Shell
bonus_lumina: Applies Shell for 3 turns at the start of battle.
unlock_description: Obtained by helping the White Hexga.

name: Prolonged Shell
bonus_lumina: When applying Shell, its duration increases by 2.
unlock_description: Defeat the Watcher in the elevated area west of the north exit of the Forgotten Lands. Requires Esquie's flying ability.

name: Overpowered Shell
unlock_description: Defeat the Bud in a confined area east of the Sharp Cemetery. Requires Esquie's flying ability.

name: Charges on Alteration
bonus_lumina: +10% Gradient charge when applying a buff. Once per turn.
unlock_description: Start from the small tower where the sword cultist roams and use your grappling hook several times until you reach the picto.

name: Charges on Attack
bonus_lumina: +15% Gradient charge on each basic attack.
unlock_description: In the Mountain area, find an opening that requires you to crouch and sneak through. Once on the other side, drop left to find the picto among crates.

name: Charges on Burn
bonus_lumina: +20% Gradient charge when inflicting Burn on a target. Once per turn.
unlock_description: Pass behind the merchant Grour and jump the walkway to find the picto.

name: Charges on Counter
bonus_lumina: +10% Gradient charge on each counter.
unlock_description: After passing a faceless man in the Mountain area, go right and use the grappling hook twice. Continue until you find two stilt walkers. The picto is on the ground next to them.

name: Charges on Criticals
bonus_lumina: +20% Gradient charge on a critical hit. Once per turn.
unlock_description: Use your grappling hook on the roof where the merchant is, then jump platform to platform on the right to reach the picto.

name: Charges on Weakness
bonus_lumina: +15% Gradient charge on hitting a weakness (once per turn).
unlock_description: To buy from the merchant Eragol for 53,880 chroma.

name: Charges on Fracture
bonus_lumina: Gradient Fracture attack damage increased by 50%.
unlock_description: To buy from the merchant Fusoka for 97,800 chroma.

name: Charges on Mark
bonus_lumina: +20% Gradient charge on hitting a marked target. Once per turn.
unlock_description: To buy from the merchant Anthonypo for 100,050 chroma.

name: Charges on Stun
bonus_lumina: +5% Gradient charge on hitting a stunned enemy.
unlock_description: To pick up at the foot of the tree in the square where the flower sellers are.

name: Beneficial Contamination
bonus_lumina: +2 AP when applying an alteration. Once per turn.
unlock_description: To buy from the merchant Persik for 48,200 chroma.

name: Improved Counter I
bonus_lumina: Counter damage increased by 25%.
unlock_description: To buy from the merchant Grour for 122,125 chroma.

name: Improved Counter II
bonus_lumina: Counter damage increased by 50%.
unlock_description: Obtained by defeating the Chromatic Gatherer.

name: Improved Counter III
bonus_lumina: Counter damage increased by 75%.
unlock_description: Obtained by defeating the Chromatic Stilt Walker.

name: Healing Counter
bonus_lumina: Recovers 20% health on each counter.
unlock_description: To buy from the merchant at the area entrance for 20,400 chroma.

name: Fracturing Counter
bonus_lumina: Fracture damage increased by 50% on counters.
unlock_description: Enter the crashed airship to find the picto.

name: Criticals on Weakness
unlock_description: Obtained by completing Level 6, Trial 3 of the tower.

name: Criticals on Vulnerability
unlock_description: In front of a small camp accessible from the beach northwest of Amber Leaves.

name: Accelerating Danger
bonus_lumina: Gains Haste when dropping below 50% health.
unlock_description: From the flag in the Resin Veil Grove, proceed straight ahead and go around a tree stump to find the picto.

name: Protective Danger
bonus_lumina: Gains Shell when dropping below 50% health.
unlock_description: Facing the giant anchor, head left to find the picto behind the seaweed.

name: Overpowered Danger
bonus_lumina: Gains Empowerment when dropping below 50% health.
unlock_description: Behind a rocky pillar in the central area of the Painteress's temple.

name: Last Stand Haste
bonus_lumina: The character gains Haste when fighting alone.
unlock_description: Obtained after first defeating Bertrand Big Hands.

name: Last Stand Critical
bonus_lumina: 100% critical chance when fighting alone.
unlock_description: Obtained after first defeating Matthieu the Colossus.

name: Last Stand Protective
bonus_lumina: The character gains Shell when fighting alone.
unlock_description: Obtained after first defeating Dominique Big Feet.

name: Last Stand Empowering
bonus_lumina: The character gains Empowerment when fighting alone.
unlock_description: Obtained after first defeating Julien Small Head.

name: Double Burn
bonus_lumina: +1 Burn for each Burn inflicted.
unlock_description: To buy from the Gestral merchant for 89,800 chroma after defeating him.

name: Double Mark
bonus_lumina: Marks require one extra hit to be removed.
unlock_description: To buy from the merchant Klaudiso for 42,400 chroma.

name: Random Defense
bonus_lumina: Damage taken is randomly multiplied by a value between 50% and 200%.
unlock_description: Can be found in the paint sphere of the Corrupted Sanctuary.

name: Empowering Dodge
bonus_lumina: Damage increases by 5% after each successive successful dodge. Stacks up to 10 times.
unlock_description: Located northwest of a red forest southeast of the Gestral Climbing Beach. Requires Esquie's flying ability.

name: Healing Fire
bonus_lumina: Recovers 25% health when attacking a burning target. Once per turn.
unlock_description: From the location of Glissando, head right then continue forward, descend a rope, use the grappling hook, then take the small passage to find the picto.

name: Accelerating Fracture
bonus_lumina: Replay on successful Fracture.
unlock_description: On the ground behind the Contortionists.

name: Enhanced Fracture
bonus_lumina: Fracture damage increased by 25%.
unlock_description: Obtained by defeating the Ultimate Sakapatate.

name: Burning Fracture
bonus_lumina: Applies 3 Burns when fracturing an enemy.
unlock_description: From the flag of the Icefall area, take the left path then climb. You'll find the picto on your left on an isolated platform.

name: Critical Fracture
bonus_lumina: Fracture damage increased by 25% on critical hits.
unlock_description: On the beach west of Occult Views, break the rock with Paint Break ability to find the picto.

name: Fiery Fracture
bonus_lumina: Fracturing a target doubles its number of Burns.
unlock_description: Obtained by completing Level 7, Trial 3 of the tower.

name: Weakening Fracture
bonus_lumina: Applies Vulnerability on Fracture.
unlock_description: To buy from the merchant Eragol for 53,880 chroma.

name: Gradient Fracture
bonus_lumina: +50% Gradient charge on inflicting a Fracture to a target.
unlock_description: From Grandis, take the middle path then turn right. You'll find the picto in a nook on your left.

name: Marking Fracture
bonus_lumina: Applies Mark on Fracture.
unlock_description: To buy from the merchant Anthonypo for 80,040 chroma.

name: Slowing Fracture
bonus_lumina: Applies Slow on Fracture.
unlock_description: To buy from the merchant Fusoka for 97,800 chroma.

name: Empowering Fracture
bonus_lumina: Gains Empowerment on fracturing an enemy.
unlock_description: After defeating the Cruler in the second area to the left from the central square, the picto can be picked up on the ground.

name: Fracture on Attack
bonus_lumina: Basic attacks can cause Fracture.
unlock_description: Obtained by defeating the Corrupted Light Dark Clair near the Arc de Triomphe.

name: Energizing Fracture
bonus_lumina: +3 AP on inflicting Fracture to an enemy.
unlock_description: Obtained after defeating the Chromatic Troubadour. The picto is picked up just behind him.

name: Fighter Gradient
bonus_lumina: Gradient attack damage increased by 25%.
unlock_description: In the left part of the garden, eliminate the two Nevrons then climb the stairs to find the picto.

name: Energizing Gradient
bonus_lumina: +1 AP per Gradient charge consumed.
unlock_description: Obtained by defeating the Frost Bishop.

name: Accelerating Healing
bonus_lumina: Healing an ally also grants Haste for 1 turn.
unlock_description: On the small island you cross just after leaving Rockwave Cliffs.

name: Boldness
bonus_lumina: Damage increased by 30% but cannot receive healing.
unlock_description: From the flag in the Valley of Joy, advance into the clearing and take the right path. You will find the picto under a tree near a shield bearer.

name: Immaculate
bonus_lumina: The character deals 30% more damage as long as they are not hit by enemy attacks.
unlock_description: Obtained by defeating the Mask Master.

name: Initiative
bonus_lumina: Acts first.
unlock_description: Climb the rocks opposite the gazebo to find the picto.

name: Improved Initiative
bonus_lumina: First hit damage increased by 50%. Once per battle.
unlock_description: To buy from the merchant Grour for 117,240 chroma.

name: Elusive
bonus_lumina: +1 AP on a perfect dodge. Once per turn.
unlock_description: Automatically obtained after the first fight with Moon.

name: Instant Crit
unlock_description: To buy from the first merchant in the Gestral bazaar.

name: Improved Slowness
bonus_lumina: +15% to the reduction of speed imposed by Slowness.
unlock_description: The picto is at the end of the island, accessible after climbing some climbing holds. The mini-level is located in the air, east of Coastal Cave.

name: Fracturing Slowness
bonus_lumina: Fracture damage increased by 25% against slowed enemies.
unlock_description: Break one of the rocks southwest of Mitrien Cave with the Paint Break ability. Requires Esquie's flying ability.

name: Lone Wolf
bonus_lumina: Deals 50% more damage when fighting alone.
unlock_description: To buy from the merchant Grour for 97,700 chroma.

name: Weakening Mark
bonus_lumina: Marked targets deal 30% less damage.
unlock_description: Use the Grappling Hook to find the picto on the roof of the building.

name: Mark After Mark
bonus_lumina: 50% chance to apply Mark when attacking a target already marked.
unlock_description: To buy from the merchant Fusoka for 122,250 chroma.

name: Burning Mark
bonus_lumina: Applies Burn when hitting a marked enemy.
unlock_description: After crossing the Petank, follow the main path and go along the left wall to find the picto slightly below.

name: Healing Mark
bonus_lumina: Recovers 25% health when hitting a marked enemy.
unlock_description: To buy from the scam merchant in the Gestral bazaar.

name: Gratifying Mark
bonus_lumina: +2 AP when attacking a marked target. Once per turn.
unlock_description: To buy from the Gestral merchant for 53,880 chroma after defeating him.

name: Overpowered Mark
bonus_lumina: Gains Empowerment when hitting a marked enemy.
unlock_description: Climb using climbing holds and defeat the two enemies to pick up the picto on the ground.

name: Defensive Mode
bonus_lumina: When taking damage, consumes 1 AP to take 30% less damage (if possible).
unlock_description: To find near the rear access of Rockwave Cliffs.

name: Burning Death
bonus_lumina: Applies 3 Burns to all enemies upon death.
unlock_description: Obtained by defeating the 3 dancers in the Frozen Station area.

name: Healing Death
bonus_lumina: When the character dies, other expedition members recover all their health.
unlock_description: You must face the golden chevalier in the Manor Gardens to get the picto placed behind her.

name: Fracturing Death
bonus_lumina: Fully charges the enemy's Fracture gauge when the character dies.
unlock_description: Obtained by defeating the Electric Chromatic Bishop behind Rockwave Cave. Requires Esquie's flying ability to reach.

name: Protective Death
bonus_lumina: When the character dies, allies gain Shell.
unlock_description: After talking to a faceless man, proceed and take a right. Defeat the enemies to find the picto on the ground in a slightly elevated corner.

name: Preserving Death
bonus_lumina: When the character dies, allies gain 3 shields.
unlock_description: Kill all the crows in the area using the Aiming mode to make the Chromatic Hatmaker appear. Then defeat him to get the picto.

name: Sudden Death
bonus_lumina: Kills self at the start of the battle.
unlock_description: To buy from the merchant Pinabby for 5,320 chroma.

name: Energizing Death
bonus_lumina: When the character dies, allies gain +4 AP.
unlock_description: To buy from the merchant at the Station after bringing him eternal ice. Cost 58,800 chroma.

name: Healing Parry
bonus_lumina: Recovers 3% health on each successful parry.
unlock_description: Obtained by completing the 3 challenges of the White Troubadour.

name: Risky Parry
bonus_lumina: +1 AP on a successful parry, but damage taken is doubled.
unlock_description: Obtained by defeating the Orphan, the Golden Chevalier, and another enemy southwest of the Esoteric Ruins. Requires Esquie's flying ability.

name: Empowering Parry
bonus_lumina: Each successful parry increases damage dealt by 5% until the end of the next turn. Taking any damage removes this buff.
unlock_description: To buy from the merchant Fusoka for 97,800 chroma.

name: Healing Share
bonus_lumina: Recovers 15% of all healing received by other characters.
unlock_description: To buy from the merchant Blouraga for 19,200 chroma.

name: Painter
bonus_lumina: Converts all physical damage into void damage.
unlock_description: In the second area to the right of the central square, go up the stairs on your right and follow the path. Then use the grappling hook and jump twice to find the picto.

name: Full Power
bonus_lumina: Damage increased by 25% when health is at maximum.
unlock_description: To buy from the merchant Cribappa for 53,200 chroma.

name: Only One Left
bonus_lumina: Maximum health is 1.
unlock_description: Obtained by defeating the Mime of the Dark Cliffs.

name: Faster than Stronger
bonus_lumina: Always acts twice in a row but deals 50% less damage.
unlock_description: Obtained by defeating the Creation mini-boss in the Light Gardens.

name: Versatility
bonus_lumina: After a free-aim shot, basic attack damage increases by 50% for 1 turn.
unlock_description: To buy from the merchant Anthonypo for 80,040 chroma.

name: Exhausting Power
bonus_lumina: Damage increased by 50% when Exhausted.
unlock_description: To pick up on the ground near the Chromatic Hexga.

name: First Offensive
bonus_lumina: The first hit dealt and received deal 50% more damage.
unlock_description: Obtained by defeating the Chromatic Mitrien.

name: Retreat Specialist
bonus_lumina: Allows instant escape.
unlock_description: Obtained from Sastro as a reward for returning the lost Gestrals.

name: Overpainted Power
bonus_lumina: Damage can exceed 9,999 points.
unlock_description: Obtained by defeating the Painteress.

name: Draining Purification
bonus_lumina: Consumes 1 AP to prevent the application of alterations (if possible).
unlock_description: The picto is on the ground just behind the two orphans to defeat.

name: Energizing Purification
bonus_lumina: Dispels the first received alteration and grants 2 AP.
unlock_description: To buy from the merchant Mistra after defeating him for 40,800 chroma.

name: Shortcut
bonus_lumina: Acts immediately if health falls below 30%. Once per battle.
unlock_description: Obtained by defeating the first enemies in the starting area.

name: Improved Haste
bonus_lumina: +25% to the speed increase granted by Haste.
unlock_description: To buy from the merchant at the Station after bringing him eternal ice. Cost 85,750 chroma.

name: Instant Haste
bonus_lumina: Applies Haste for 3 turns at the start of battle.
unlock_description: While controlling Maelle, you'll find an arch on your left leading to three chevaliers. You need to defeat them to get the picto on the ground.

name: Prolonged Haste
bonus_lumina: When applying Haste, its duration increases by 2.
unlock_description: Go to the enclosed area south of Burning Glacier to find the picto in front of a camp. Requires Esquie's flying ability.

name: Protective Haste
bonus_lumina: Also applies Shell when applying Haste.
unlock_description: To buy from the merchant Anthonypo for 100,050 chroma.

name: Paradoxical Resurrection
bonus_lumina: Acts immediately when revived.
unlock_description: From the Ruined Station flag, head toward the station. Descend a rope and face the Chromatic Dancer to get the picto.

name: Protected Resurrection
bonus_lumina: +1 shield when the character is revived.
unlock_description: To buy from the merchant Grour for 117,240 chroma.

name: Regenerating Resurrection
bonus_lumina: Grants Regeneration for 3 turns upon revival.
unlock_description: In the Chromatic Gault area, look behind the first house to the right of the zone entrance to find the picto.

name: Empowering Resurrection
bonus_lumina: Grants Empowerment for 3 turns upon revival.
unlock_description: Can be found in the high paint sphere in the Duelist boss area.

name: Energizing Resurrection
bonus_lumina: +3 AP to all allies when this character is revived.
unlock_description: Obtained by defeating the Chromatic Hexga.

name: Roulette
bonus_lumina: Each hit has a 50% chance to deal either 50% or 200% of normal damage.
unlock_description: Talk to the Gestral player and answer 'I don't care' to his question to obtain the picto.

name: Recovery
bonus_lumina: Recovers 10% health at the start of the turn.
unlock_description: Pay the amounts requested by the Blesser for a total of 90,000 chroma.

name: Instant Regeneration
bonus_lumina: Applies Regeneration for 3 turns at the start of battle.
unlock_description: To pick up near the Blesser.

name: Second Chance
bonus_lumina: Comes back to life with 100% health. Once per battle.
unlock_description: Obtained by defeating two Creations.

name: Effective Healing
bonus_lumina: Doubles all healing received.
unlock_description: To pick up on the ground after defeating the Chromatic Sword Cultist.

name: Shared Healing
bonus_lumina: When healing an ally, also heals self but at half the amount.
unlock_description: Near the entrance of the White Tree mini-level.

name: Protective Healing
bonus_lumina: Healing an ally also grants Shell for 1 turn.
unlock_description: To buy from the merchant Eragol for 53,880 chroma.

name: Empowered Healing
bonus_lumina: Healing an ally also grants Empowerment for 1 turn.
unlock_description: To buy from the merchant Anthonypo for 80,040 chroma.

name: Energizing Healing
bonus_lumina: Also grants 2 AP to the healed ally.
unlock_description: On the beach north of White Tree Island.

name: Solidification
bonus_lumina: +2 shields when character health drops below 50%. Once per battle.
unlock_description: To buy from the Gestral merchant for 67,350 chroma after defeating him.

name: Effective Support
bonus_lumina: +2 AP when using an item.
unlock_description: In a camp located northeast of the Siren Dunes. Requires Esquie's flying ability.

name: Fracture Specialist
bonus_lumina: Fracture damage increased by 50%, but base damage reduced by 20%.
unlock_description: To buy from the merchant Fusoka for 81,500 chroma.

name: Improved Empowerment
bonus_lumina: +15% to damage increase granted by Empowerment.
unlock_description: To buy from the merchant Klaudiso for 37,100 chroma.

name: Instant Empowerment
bonus_lumina: Applies Empowerment for 3 turns at the start of battle.
unlock_description: Face the Chalier and defeat him to obtain the picto. Be careful, you must accept to kill him immediately after.

name: Prolonged Empowerment
bonus_lumina: When applying Empowerment, its duration increases by 2.
unlock_description: To buy from the merchant at the entrance of the area for 20,400 chroma.

name: Quick Empowerment
bonus_lumina: Also applies Haste when applying Empowerment.
unlock_description: In the Golden Tree area, at the end of the path after the trio of enemies.

name: Survivor
bonus_lumina: Allows survival of a fatal attack with 1 HP remaining. Once per battle.
unlock_description: To buy from the merchant at the Station after bringing him eternal ice. Cost 98,000 chroma.

name: Accelerating Tint
bonus_lumina: Healing tints also grant Haste.
unlock_description: To buy from the merchant Anthonypo for 80,040 chroma.

name: Charging Tint
bonus_lumina: 5% Gradient charge when using an item.
unlock_description: After defeating the Stalact south of Gestral Beach in the Giant Ascension mini-game. Can be picked up nearby.

name: Energizing Healing Tint
bonus_lumina: Healing tints also grant 1 AP.
unlock_description: Obtained by defeating the Hexga near the buildings.

name: Energizing Life Tint
bonus_lumina: Life tints also grant 3 AP.
unlock_description: To buy from the Gestral merchant for 67,350 chroma after defeating him.

name: Protective Tint
bonus_lumina: Healing tints also grant Shell.
unlock_description: At the end of one of the wooden bridges in the Misty Zone.

name: Preserving Tint
bonus_lumina: Healing tints also grant 2 shields.
unlock_description: Go to the enclosed area east of the Sharp Cemetery to find the picto among the ruins. Requires Esquie's flying ability.

name: Purifying Tint
bonus_lumina: Healing tints also dispel target alterations.
unlock_description: Obtained by defeating the Bishop.

name: Empowering Tint
bonus_lumina: Healing tints also grant Empowerment.
unlock_description: Obtained by completing Level 8, Trial 3 of the tower.

name: Temporal Tint
bonus_lumina: Energizing tints also grant Haste.
unlock_description: Obtained by completing Level 4, Trial 3 of the tower.

name: Piercing Shot
bonus_lumina:
Free-aim damage increased by 25%.
Free-aim shots ignore shields.
unlock_description: From Expedition flag 63, go left until you reach an area with a Sakapatate. There, you must break a rock with the Paint Break power. The picto is at the end of the path.

name: Sharpshooter
bonus_lumina: Each turn, the first free-aim shot deals 200% more damage and grants a chance to cause Fracture.
unlock_description: Defeat the two stilt walkers and the reaper.

name: Accelerating Shots
bonus_lumina: 20% chance to gain Haste on free-aim shots.
unlock_description: To buy from the merchant Fusoka for 89,650 chroma.

name: Burning Shots
bonus_lumina: 20% chance to apply Burn on free-aim shots.
unlock_description: To buy from the merchant at the Station after bringing him eternal ice. Cost 53,901 chroma.

name: Fracturing Shots
bonus_lumina: Fracture damage increased by 50% on free-aim shots.
unlock_description: After leaving the Tide Cave, head right and jump on rocks to find the picto.

name: Marking Shots
bonus_lumina: 20% chance to apply Mark on free-aim shots.
unlock_description: Facing the lantern-lit path, follow the path on the left to find the picto in the dead-end.

name: Protective Shots
bonus_lumina: 20% chance to gain Shell on free-aim shots.
unlock_description: Placed on the corner of one of the empty frames.

name: Overpowered Shots
bonus_lumina: 20% chance to gain Empowerment on free-aim shots.
unlock_description: Use the Paint Break power to break the rock near the sleeping doctor.

name: Energizing Shots
bonus_lumina: 20% chance to gain 1 AP on free-aim shots.
unlock_description: To pick up on the ground in the Goblu arena.

name: Teamwork
bonus_lumina: Damage increased by 10% if all allies are still alive.
unlock_description: To buy from the merchant Pinabby for 9,120 chroma, after defeating him.

name: Cheater
bonus_lumina: Always acts twice in a row.
unlock_description: Obtained by defeating the Sprong. Requires Esquie's swimming ability.

name: Improved Aim
bonus_lumina: Free-aim damage increased by 50%.
unlock_description: Near the wreck, climb the pillar then jump platform to platform to reach the picto.

name: Cla's Vitality
bonus_lumina: Recovers 100% health at the start of the turn if no damage was taken since the previous turn.
unlock_description: Obtained by defeating Cla.

name: Life Steal
bonus_lumina: Basic attacks restore 15% health.
unlock_description: After defeating a Sakapatate, fight the enemy in the right part of the cave to obtain the picto.

name: Improved Vulnerability
bonus_lumina: +15% to the increase caused by Vulnerability.
unlock_description: Obtained by completing Level 1, Trial 3 of the tower.

name: Warm-up
bonus_lumina: Damage increased by 5% per turn. Can stack up to 5 times.
unlock_description: Obtained by defeating the Big Head boss located in front of Coastal Cave.

name: Refreshing Elimination
bonus_lumina: Recovers 50% health upon killing an enemy.
unlock_description: To buy from the merchant Grour for 107,471 chroma.

name: Jump Energy
bonus_lumina: +1 AP on every successful jump counter.
unlock_description: From the Petank's location, head left to find the picto.

name: Painful Energy
bonus_lumina: No AP gained on successful parry, but +1 AP when the character takes damage.
unlock_description: Obtained by defeating the cultist.

name: Mastered Energy
bonus_lumina: +1 AP on every AP gain.
unlock_description: Obtained by defeating the Serpenphare. You'll need Esquie's flying ability to reach him.

name: Deadly Energy I
bonus_lumina: +3 AP on killing an enemy.
unlock_description: On the island of the Dark Shores mini-level. Requires Esquie's swimming ability.

name: Deadly Energy II
bonus_lumina: +3 AP on killing an enemy.
unlock_description: At the abandoned expedition camp, after meeting the white Amphorian, follow the path to the right in the next area until crates.

name: Energy - Attack I
bonus_lumina: +1 AP on every basic attack.
unlock_description: To buy from the merchant Grour for 146,550 chroma.

name: Energy - Attack II
bonus_lumina: +1 AP on every basic attack.
unlock_description: To buy from the merchant Klaudiso for 37,100 chroma.

name: Energy - Shell
bonus_lumina: Grants 2 AP when applying Shell.
unlock_description: In the area east of the Floating Casino, break one of the rocks at the foot of a large pillar with Paint Break ability to get the picto. Requires Esquie's flying ability.

name: Energy - Start I
bonus_lumina: +1 AP at the start of battle.
unlock_description: On the beach after the entrance of the Rockwave Cliffs. Can only be reached by breaking the rocks with Esquie.

name: Energy - Start II
bonus_lumina: +1 AP at the start of battle.
unlock_description: Climb the cliff near the cave to find the picto in a dead end.

name: Energy - Start III
bonus_lumina: +1 AP at the start of battle.
unlock_description: On the path to exit the cave, after using the grappling hook.

name: Energy - Start IV
bonus_lumina: +1 AP at the start of battle.
unlock_description: In the dead-end to the left opposite the Fort entrance.

name: Energy - Weakness
bonus_lumina: +1 AP on hitting a weakness. Once per turn.
unlock_description: In the Corrupted Cliffs area, when you face three enemies led by a Hexga, go around the rock to the right to find the picto.

name: Energy - Parry
bonus_lumina: +1 AP on successful parry.
unlock_description: To buy from the merchant Grour for 170,975 chroma.

name: Energy - Haste
bonus_lumina: Grants 2 AP when applying Haste.
unlock_description: Obtained by completing Level 2, Trial 3 of the tower.

name: Energy - Empowerment
bonus_lumina: Grants 2 AP when applying Empowerment.
unlock_description: The picto is located on the roof where Gustave stands at the very beginning of the game.

name: Energy - Turn
bonus_lumina: +1 AP at the start of the turn.
unlock_description: Obtained by defeating the Siren boss.

name: Critical Stun
bonus_lumina: 100% critical chance when hitting a stunned target.
unlock_description: To buy from the Gestral merchant for 53,880 chroma after defeating him.

name: Healing Stun
bonus_lumina: Recovers 5% health when hitting a stunned target.
unlock_description: After leaving the opera, go left to encounter two groups of enemies twice. You'll find the picto a bit further in a dead-end.

name: Timely Stun
bonus_lumina: Damage increased by 30% against stunned targets.
unlock_description: To buy from the Gestral merchant for 67,350 chroma after defeating him.

name: Energizing Stun
bonus_lumina: +1 AP when hitting a stunned target with a skill.
unlock_description: Can be found in the paint sphere in the second area to the right from the central square. Requires Paint Break ability to reach the sphere.

name: Energizing Healing
bonus_lumina: +2 AP when healing an ally. Once per turn.
unlock_description: Near the Gargant, climb a rope, then proceed left to find the Picto near a Nevron corpse.
